name: Maestro: The Masterclass
abstract: Step into a gorgeous opera house filled with thousands of music fans, face off against a gigantic orchestra of over two hundred fully animated virtuosos!

detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Russian, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish, Italian
detail.app_release_note:

We are delighted to announce the release of a new free update!
We want to make Culture accessible to everyone, so we have added the option to make the experience fully playable with controllers!â€‹

Concert
- Updated gameplay score for Verdi - Dies Irae.
 
Subtitles
- Added subtitles for the Masterclass and translations for all 10 languages
- Subtitles can be toggled from the main menu
 
Localization
- Translation fixes in various languages
- More content was localised (ie: end of concert quotes, game logo)

Controller support
- You can now play Maestro: The Masterclass with controllers, and haptics!
- General bug fixing & improvements
- Improved audio issue that could cause severe latencies
- Tweaks to audio effects
- Tweaks to improve performance
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4 Ultra
